content: I will tell you that I'm going to spend the summer with this management team with Pet and Home & Garden, probably numerous outside consultants kind of re-underwriting the business, really looking at where our strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, threats are and then look also competitive set, try to figure out where my blind spots might be, where the hockey puck is going to be three to five years from now, because really we want to kind of present to the Board in November kind of our outlook for building back to kind of a $5 billion-ish revenue -- billion in a quarter plus EBITDA pure-play pet home and garden company.
